When you need someone who cares
These arms of mine are always open
One thin dime is all you need and I'll be there

Oh, you're chasing rainbows and I understand

Once I was a broken bottle
lying in a crowded bar
waiting for the band to start again

And from the floor I'd stare up
at the bright lights and the silhouettes
cast along the wall behind your head

O, I would wait
for you to find me there

to my apathy

just as sure as the days go short

Than the pattern
